query:
INSERT INTO workspace_integrations (
            workspace_id,
            service_name,
            oauth_data,
            resource_path,
            created_by,
            created_at,
            updated_at
        ) VALUES (
            $1, $2, $3, $4, $5, now(), now()
        )
        ON CONFLICT (workspace_id, service_name)
        DO UPDATE SET
            oauth_data = $3,
            resource_path = $4,
            updated_at = now()
